newsitem.title: USA: US stock index futures end mixed, S&Ps trim losses.
newsitem.headline: US stock index futures end mixed, S&Ps trim losses.

text.p: April 23 - Most U.S. stock index futures ended mixed. June S&Ps ended an extremely choppy session with only modest losses. Gains in some technology stocks boosted Nasdaq 100s and lifted S&Ps off session lows, traders said. ((Chicago DerivativesDesk(312)408-8750)) E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
